options.name: Pit Fighter
options.description: You have the aura of a combatant. Gain +1 skill with presence. When you are in a settlement, you can spend a few hours to determine if there are any sanctioned or illegal fighting leagues, clubs or competitions.

options.name: Battle Conditioning
options.description: You have the body of a fighter, lean from battle. Gain +1 skill with fitness. When you start your turn winded, roll a fitness check; if the result is higher than a 7, the condition is removed automatically.

options.name: Javelin Master
options.description: Taking down opponents before they get to you is a vital skill in the arena. Gain +1 skill with throwing weapons.

options.name: Thick Skin
options.description: Jeering crowds do not affect you. Gain +2 maximum resolve. Additionally, you are immune from effects that would mock, provoke or taunt you.

options.name: Action : Make Space
options.description: You strike and fade away in one fluid motion. Make a single attack against up to 2 adjacent creatures with a melee weapon with the slashing property, then move 1 unit. Targets damaged by this attack cannot take reactions against you as a response to this movement.

options.name: Action : Leaping Thrust
options.description: You leap through the air and drive your weapon downward with devastating force. Take the Jump action toward a creature, then make an attack with a melee weapon with the piercing property. Deal additional damage equal to the distance jumped in units.

options.name: Weapons of the Arena
options.description: You've mastered the tools of the gladiatorial trade. Gain +1 skill with simple melee weapons.

options.name: Combat Improv
options.description: Part of defending yourself is being able to improvise on the fly. Gain +1 skill with expression. Whenever you roll a '1' as part of dice pool for a defense or contested check, replace that roll with an expression dice. This trait does not work if you have any mental conditions.

options.name: Glory Strikes
options.description: When you land a killing blow against creature of a standard tier or higher with a melee or throwing attack, you gain 2 morale. Gain an additional morale for each critical hit in the attack roll.

options.name: Action : Called Shot
options.description: You target a limb on a large or smaller creature with a melee weapon attack, dealing damage. If 3 or more dice hit, you can target a limb to disable. At the end of each turn, the target must roll an endurance check of 7 or higher to regain function of the limb. If 3 or more dice are critical hits, this attack amputates or mangles the chosen limb instead. This attack can be used against huge creatures, but the dice requirements are raised to 4.
